definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Are there any other policies covering the helper?
sentences.chinese: 家傭是否擁有其他保險？

sentences.english: A lot of families face problems like maids abusing children or carrying serious diseases.
sentences.chinese: 不少家庭面對家傭虐兒或患有嚴重疾病等問題。

sentences.english: In Singapore, the government implemented new measures aimed at addressing abuses of foreign domestic workers.
sentences.chinese: 新加坡政府實施了新措施，以解決虐待外籍家傭問題。

sentences.english: Her domestic skills come mostly from being a wife and mother.
sentences.chinese: 她的家傭技能主要來自她的母親和自己作爲一名主婦。

sentences.english: New measures were introduced to help domestic workers.
sentences.chinese: 已經採取了新措施來幫助保護家傭。

definition: abbr. for 外籍勞工|外籍劳工[wai4 ji2 lao2 gong1]/foreign worker
kind of work in production (e.g. benchwork, foundry work etc)
to dispatch (sb) in an official capacity/to be posted (as an ambassador, foreign correspondent etc)
to make a formal request/formal request/to make a claim (law)
